name: Cheese Cats
description:
Cheese Cats

Cheese Cats is a physics-based platform game about the story of Cheesy, the silliest cat you'll ever meet, who has trouble with a REAL cat that dropped his prize all over the place.

now he must look for his prize until he finds the truth

HOW TO PLAY? 

WD/Arrows/Left Analog - Movement

Cursor - Move those Paws

Left-click / Right-click - Grab

S - Duck

Mobile version coming soon!
